contentList.content: Acid Splash (OneDnD)
Blade Ward (OneDnD)
Chill Touch (OneDnD)
Friends (OneDnD)
Poison Spray (OneDnD)

Shocking Grasp (OneDnD)
Spare the Dying (OneDnD)
True Strike (OneDnd)
True Strike (Melee)
True Strike (Ranged)
Spellcasting Modifier
Make a magical melee attack, It uses your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Ability</LSTag> for <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
Make a magical ranged attack, It uses your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Ability</LSTag> for <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.

Make a magical attack with your weapon, you may have it deal[1] instead of its regular[2]. The attack uses your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Charisma ability</LSTag> for the <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and Damage Rolls instead of using <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag>.

Make a magical attack with your weapon, you may have it deal[1] instead of its regular[2]. The attack uses your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Intelligence ability</LSTag> for the <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and Damage Rolls instead of using <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag>.

Make a magical attack with your weapon, you may have it deal[1] instead of its regular[2]. The attack uses your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Wisdom ability</LSTag> for the <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and Damage Rolls instead of using <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag>.
Deals an additional [1] at level 5 and [2] at level 10.
True Strike will deal[1] instead of[2].
The Caster's weapon is magical and deals [1]. <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> use the wielder's <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Ability Modifier</LSTag>.
Creature's weapon is magical and deals [1]. <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> use the wielder's <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> modifier.

Your staff or club becomes magical: it deals [1], and uses your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> modifier for <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>. You may have it do its normal[2] instead.
You may have your attacks deal[1] instead of its normal[2].
Shillelagh: Main Hand
Shillelagh: Off Hand
Damage is increased to [1] at level 5 and [2] at level 10.
True Strike: Radiant
True Strike attacks deal[1].
Replace regular attacks with True Strike.
Produce Flame: Create
Conjure a flame and throw it at your target.
Does not cost a Bonus Action if you've already conjured a flame.
Cannot make an <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attack>LSTag>.

The target cannot make an <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag> until its next turn. This spell has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on creatures with metal armour.
Increased Range: [1]
You trace a sigil of warding, imposing <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on the creature's <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Melee Attack Roll</LSTag> against you.

<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> The Charm breaks if the target takes damage or if the caster makes an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> or causes a <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>. The target can't be charmed again until after a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
Friend blocked
Cannot be affected by <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="CL_Target_OneDnD_Friends">Friends</LSTag> until after a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
Cast again to dismiss the flames.
Range is increased to [1] at level 5 and [2] at level 10.
Befriend the target, gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> against it and It cannot attack you.
